user.title: Set up GFA Waste Calendar
user.description:
Enter the URL to your ICS calendar. You can find this in the GFA app or on the GFA website.

Example: {example_url}

reminder.title: Configure Reminder
reminder.description: When would you like to be reminded about the pickup?

alexa.title: Select Alexa Device
alexa.description: Select the Alexa device that should announce the reminders.

waste_types.title: Select Waste Types
waste_types.description: Select the waste types for which you want to receive reminders.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to calendar. Please check the URL.
error.invalid_ics: The file could not be read as a calendar.

announce_pickup.name: Announce Pickup
announce_pickup.description: Announces the next pickup via Alexa.

refresh_calendar.name: Refresh Calendar
refresh_calendar.description: Refreshes the data from the ICS calendar.
